<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.ui.ng.guided_flow" name="NG Common for the Guided Flow experience" version="1.0.0" state="published" invalidate_properties="true" provider_name="ServiceNow">
<description>Common Angular Components for the Guided Flow experience</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.tablet.theme"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.themes.doctype"/> </requires>
<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GuidedFlowBootstrapperService" class="com.glide.ui.ng.guided_flow.BootstrapperService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="GuidedFlowTableService" class="com.glide.ui.ng.guided_flow.TableService"/>
</plugin>]]></definition> <description>Common Angular Components for the Guided Flow experience</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.ui.ng.guided_flow</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>NG Common for the Guided Flow experience</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.ui.ng.guided_flow/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.ui.tablet.theme,com.glide.ui.ng,com.glide.ui.themes.doctype</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.ui.ng.guided_flow</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
